item.title: First Lego League Explore | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Dive into an exciting new season of FIRST LEGO League with the 2024-2025 theme: SUBMERGED! This year’s challenge invites participants to explore the mysteries and wonders of underwater environments while solving real-world challenges related to oceans, lakes, and waterways.

  • Participate in the official First Lego League Explore program
  • Work on collaborative projects with peers
  • Learn about real-world applications of robotics and engineering

This class is perfect for budding engineers and curious minds ready to take their first steps into the world of robotics!

item.title: Math Excellence | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
In our advanced math class, we harness the engaging and comprehensive materials from Beast Academy to cultivate a deep understanding and passion for mathematics. Each student embarks on a personalized mathematical journey under the guidance of an expert Blue Ridge Boost instructor.

Class Structure

  1. Introduction: Each session begins with a concise lesson introducing new concepts and exercise types.
  2. Guided Practice: Students then apply these concepts through hands-on problem-solving, with instructor support readily available.
  3. Individual Exploration: Using Beast Academy practice books, students tackle challenging exercises and puzzles that reinforce learning and promote critical thinking.

Our Approach

This integrated approach goes beyond mere calculation, emphasizing:

item.title: Python Fundamentals | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
This course is a comprehensive, year-long program designed for middle school students with no prior coding experience. It introduces fundamental programming concepts using Python through interactive exercises and projects centered around controlling a virtual character named Tracy. The course covers commands, functions, loops, variables, conditionals, and lists, progressing to more complex tasks like user interaction and creating visual projects.

Topics include:

Commands

Understanding basic commands is crucial as it forms the foundation of programming, allowing Tracy to perform specific actions.

item.title: Advanced Python for Teens | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Advanced Python for Teens builds on foundational Python skills and introduces students to more advanced programming concepts. This course is designed to help students create more powerful and efficient programs by exploring key topics such as functions, strings, data structures, and file input/output operations. Through engaging lessons, hands-on exercises, and creative projects, students will deepen their understanding of Python and develop practical problem-solving skills.

Course Highlights:

  • Functions and Exceptions: Learn how to decompose programs into smaller, reusable components and handle errors effectively.
  • Strings: Master advanced techniques for manipulating and processing text in programs.
  • Data Structures: Explore the creation and manipulation of tuples, lists, grids, and dictionaries to build complex programs.
  • File I/O: Gain the ability to read, write, and process information from text files.

item.title: Vex Go Challenges | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
The VEX GO Competition is an exciting, team-based robotics challenge designed specifically for elementary students to explore STEM concepts in a fun and engaging way. Using the VEX GO building system, teams will design, build, and program their robots to complete a series of creative and hands-on missions.

Participants will:

  • Develop critical thinking and teamwork skills by solving real-world challenges.
  • Learn the basics of engineering, robotics, and coding through guided activities.
  • Compete in a friendly and collaborative environment that emphasizes learning and innovation.

The VEX GO Competition provides an inspiring introduction to robotics and STEM, fostering curiosity and creativity while building confidence in young learners. Perfect for beginners with big ideas!

item.title: Block Coding with Minecraft | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
This four-class sequence introduces the students to fundamental computer science concepts, including events and coordinates. Students will use a coding environment embedded in Minecraft Education to code their own commands, which they will then use in the game.

Leveraging the engaging world of Minecraft Education, students will:

  • Explore a custom coding environment integrated within the game
  • Learn to write and execute their own commands
  • Apply coding principles to manipulate the Minecraft world in real-time
  • Develop problem-solving skills through interactive challenges
  • Gain hands-on experience with spatial reasoning and algorithmic thinking

By the end of the course, students will have a solid foundation in basic programming concepts, enhanced creativity, and improved logical reasoning skills—all while enjoying the familiar and exciting Minecraft platform.

item.title: Mechanical Foundations with REV DUO | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: The Mechanical Foundations with REV DUO course provides participants with the hands-on skills and knowledge needed to design, build, and maintain robotic systems confidently. Through interactive projects and challenges, students will explore the foundational mechanical principles that drive robotics, such as structure, motion, power transmission, and mechanical advantage. Using the REV DUO building system, participants will gain practical experience assembling and testing robotic components while learning to solve real-world engineering challenges.

item.title: C# for Unity | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Unit 1: Introduction to C# Programming and Unity
Dive into the world of game development with this beginner-friendly unit, perfect for students with no prior programming experience. Learn the fundamentals of C# programming while exploring the basics of the Unity game engine, the industry-standard platform for creating interactive games. By the end of this unit, students will:

  • Understand the Unity interface and its core components.
  • Learn foundational C# concepts such as variables, data types, and basic syntax.
  • Write simple scripts to bring objects and scenes to life in Unity.

Unit 2: Expanding C# Programming and Unity Skills
Build on the basics from Unit 1 with more advanced C# programming techniques and Unity concepts. Students will:

item.title: Advanced Python for Tweens | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Through interactive challenges, students help twin baby monkeys reunite by solving coding problems, reinforcing their understanding of Python fundamentals and advanced topics. The course covers essential concepts such as sequencing, loops, conditionals, and functions.

Course Content

  • Basics review
  • Classes: Understanding object-oriented programming to create and manage complex data structures.
  • Input: Interacting with users by receiving and processing input data.
  • String manipulation: Performing operations on text data to modify and analyze it.
  • Advanced data types: Utilizing complex data structures like dictionaries and sets for efficient data management.
  • 2D lists: Working with multi-dimensional arrays to handle grid-based data.
  • Bubble sort: Learning basic sorting algorithms to organize data effectively.

item.title: FLL Robotics with Spike Prime | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Prepare to take on the challenges of FIRST LEGO League like a pro! This course is designed to help students build a strong foundation in robotics and engineering, focusing on the critical skills needed to design, build, and optimize a competition-ready robot.

Students will:

  • Master the fundamentals of building sturdy and efficient robots tailored for competition.
  • Learn how to design and attach modular attachments that can be quickly changed to tackle a variety of missions.

This course not only teaches essential building and programming techniques but also fosters teamwork, creativity, and critical thinking. By the end, students will be fully equipped to compete with confidence and earn points like champions!

item.title: Block Coding with Beavers | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Students learn sequencing, repetition, problem-solving, and conditional logic while developing practical coding skills. The course employs a hands-on, gamified approach that gradually increases in complexity, allowing each child to advance at their own speed. By the end, students can create sophisticated programs, having built a strong foundation in coding and computational thinking.

We start to learn fundamental coding concepts by helping a beaver build a dam! The learning continues with learning to code games in Scratch.

item.title: FIRST Lego Challenge | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Prepare to take on the challenges of FIRST LEGO League like a pro! This course is designed to help students build a strong foundation in robotics and engineering, focusing on the key skills needed to design, build, and optimize a competition-ready robot.

Students will:

  • Master the fundamentals of building sturdy and efficient robots tailored for competition.
  • Learn how to design and attach modular attachments that can be quickly changed to tackle a variety of missions.
  • Develop strategies for completing missions effectively to maximize points during competitions.
  • Practice hands-on problem-solving as they refine their robot’s performance for real-world challenges.

This course not only teaches essential building and programming techniques but also fosters teamwork, creativity, and critical thinking. By the end, students will be fully equipped to compete with confidence and earn points like champions!

item.title: Code Quest | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Banana Code Quest is a gamified coding course designed to teach young students real-world coding from the first challenge. Through engaging puzzles and adventures, students help a monkey catch bananas and outsmart various animals while learning fundamental and advanced coding concepts in a fun and interactive way.

Key Features

  • Real Coding Language: Students will code using CoffeeScript, a language similar to JavaScript but with a friendlier syntax, making it perfect for kids.
  • Fun-Filled Challenges: The course includes a series of puzzles where students write code to help the monkey achieve various tasks.
  • Structured Learning: The course is divided into three parts:
    • Part 1: Fundamentals – Introduces the basics of coding.
    • Part 2: Functions & Conditions – Covers more advanced concepts.
    • Part 3: Logic & Events – Wraps up with complex coding challenges.

      • Coding Concepts Covered

      Students will learn a variety of coding concepts, including:

item.title: Scratch Coding | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Come and learn to code your own games in Scratch!

Each session will create a new game.

item.title: Java for Teens | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
This beginner-friendly class is designed specifically for teens who are interested in learning computer programming using the Java language. Whether you're completely new to coding or have some prior experience, this course will provide a fun and interactive way to develop essential programming skills.

What You'll Learn:

  • Java Basics: Learn the fundamentals of Java, including variables, data types, and basic syntax.
  • Programming Logic: Understand core programming concepts like loops, conditionals, and functions.
  • Object-Oriented Programming (OOP): Explore key OOP principles, such as classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.
  • Problem Solving: Build logical thinking and problem-solving skills through hands-on exercises and projects.
  • Real-World Applications: Create small programs and games to see how your code can solve real-world problems.

Why Take This Class?

  • Beginner-Friendly: No prior coding experience required—just a desire to learn and explore!
  • Interactive Learning: Engaging lessons, coding challenges, and personalized guidance.
  • Creative Projects: Work on fun projects, such as building a calculator, a guessing game, or simple animations.
  • Career-Ready Skills: Get a strong foundation in Java, one of the most widely-used programming languages in the world.

Who Should Join?

This class is perfect for:

item.title: Lego Robotics | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Jump into the world of robotics and coding with the LEGO Education SPIKE Prime system! This hands-on course introduces students to the exciting possibilities of robotics engineering and computational thinking through engaging, project-based learning. Designed for beginners to intermediate learners, this course will teach students how to design, build, and program robotic solutions to solve real-world challenges.

In this course, students will:

  • Learn the basics of robotics using the LEGO SPIKE Prime kit.
  • Explore block-based programming concepts like loops, conditionals, and variables.
  • Build and program robots to complete fun and interactive challenges.
  • Integrate sensors and motors to create responsive, autonomous robots.
  • Apply problem-solving and critical thinking skills to tackle real-world scenarios.

By the end of the course, students will have a strong foundation in programming and robotics, having built and programmed their own robotics projects. This course is perfect for students looking to get started with STEM learning in a fun and accessible way!

item.title: Robotics with Vex IQ | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Description:
Join us at Blue Ridge Boost for an exciting, hands-on journey into coding and computational thinking with the VEX IQ (2nd Generation) robotics platform! Using the structured curriculum from the Carnegie Mellon Robotics Academy, this class introduces students to the fundamentals of robotics programming, problem-solving, and real-world applications.

Designed for beginners and enthusiasts, the course features engaging, project-based activities that teach students to build, program, and control their robots using the VEXcode programming software. Students will learn how to:

item.title: Unity 2D Games | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Explore the exciting world of game design and programming with Unity! These beginner-friendly courses are designed to teach students the fundamentals of game development while building fun and interactive projects. With hands-on lessons and real-world applications, students will learn to create their own games and bring their ideas to life using Unity's powerful tools.

Unit 1: 2D Beginner: Adventure Game

Step into the world of 2D game development by creating an adventure game from scratch! This unit introduces students to Unity's beginner-friendly tools and workflows, focusing on how to build and design engaging 2D gameplay experiences.

item.title: Lego Robots Jr | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Join us in February and March to build Lego WeDo robots!

Material does not repeat in the two sessions.

item.title: Algebra 1 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Algebra 1 Success Made Simple!

Join Blue Ridge Boost's Group Algebra Sessions:

  • Focused Learning: Small groups of 4 students
  • Expert Guidance: Excel in your algebra homework
  • Clear Explanations: Understand equations and functions
  • Interactive Practice: Build problem-solving skills
  • Weekly Sessions: 60 minutes each
  • Comprehensive Coverage: All key Algebra 1 topics
  • Boost Your Grades and Confidence

Enroll in Blue Ridge Boost's Algebra Group today!

item.title: Geometry | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Geometry Homework Made Easy!

Join Blue Ridge Boost's Group Geometry Sessions:

  • Small groups of 4 students
  • Expert help with your geometry homework
  • Clear explanations of theorems and proofs
  • Hands-on problem-solving practice
  • 60-minute sessions weekly
  • Cover all high school geometry topics
  • Boost your grades and confidence

    • Transform triangles and circles from foes to friends!

    Enroll in Blue Ridge Boost's Geometry Group today!

item.title: Machine Learning for Kids | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Dive into the fascinating world of artificial intelligence with this hands-on class designed for young learners! Using the Machine Learning for Kids platform, students will explore how machines can "learn" from data and apply this knowledge to solve real-world problems in creative ways.

This class introduces the basics of machine learning through fun, interactive projects, where students will:

  • Learn how to train machine learning models using simple datasets.
  • Explore key concepts like classification, recognition, and prediction.
  • Use their machine learning models to create exciting projects, such as chatbots, games, and interactive applications.
  • Experiment with coding tools like Scratch and Python, ideal for beginners and adaptable for more advanced learners.

By combining coding, creativity, and problem-solving, this class helps students understand the power of AI and machine learning in technology today. Perfect for students who want to learn how AI works in a fun and accessible way!

item.title: Deep Learning Basics | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Discover the exciting world of deep learning and neural networks in this hands-on course, designed to build a strong foundation in artificial intelligence. Through interactive lessons and real-world projects, you'll gain the skills to design, build, and train deep learning models using Keras, a user-friendly and powerful library for AI development.

What You'll Learn:

  • Core Concepts: Understand the fundamentals of neural networks, deep learning models, and how they work.
  • Supervised and Unsupervised Models: Explore supervised models like convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and recurrent neural networks (RNNs), as well as unsupervised models like autoencoders.
  • Hands-On Development: Use the Keras library to create, train, and evaluate deep learning models for tasks such as regression and classification.
  • Advanced Topics: Gain a deeper understanding of critical topics like backpropagation, gradient descent, and the role of activation functions in model performance.
  • Practical Applications: Solve real-world challenges by building convolutional networks, experimenting with model depth and width, and optimizing model performance.

Course Requirements:

To get the most out of this course, you’ll need:

Math Boost | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This class is tailored for students who are in the top half of the class, but need clarifications of some grade-level concepts. It offers reinforcement of key concepts through extra practice with typical grade-level problems, ensuring that students can grasp and master the material at their own pace. Additionally, students will have the opportunity to work on materials recommended by their classroom teacher and tackle problems suggested by Blue Ridge Boost instructors, providing a tailored and comprehensive approach to meet their individual learning needs.

item.title: Math Mastery | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
This advanced mathematics class is designed for curious students ranking in the top of their class who are eager to explore math beyond the typical school curriculum. Utilizing the renowned Dimensions Singapore Math curriculum, our year-long program emphasizes deep conceptual understanding, critical thinking, problem-solving strategies, and practical application of mathematical principles.


Key Features:

  • Advanced Mental Math Strategies: Students will be introduced to various mental math techniques to improve their calculation skills.
  • Variety of Problems: The curriculum offers a range of problems, from basic exercises to more challenging ones, fostering critical and creative thinking.
  • Mastery of Concepts: Repeated practice ensures students achieve a solid understanding of each topic.
  • Problem-Solving Skills: Activities and exercises are designed to enhance analytical and logical thinking.

Why Choose This Class?

  • Enhanced Mental Math: Exposure to more mental math strategies and a greater variety of problems.
  • Advanced Curriculum: Aims to advance students beyond the typical U.S. curriculum while still covering Common Core Standards, sometimes at an earlier grade level.
  • Academic Challenge: Provides a more rigorous and engaging math experience.
  • Preparation for Higher Studies: Equips students with skills for advanced math courses and exams.
  • Holistic Approach: Focuses on understanding rather than rote learning.

Ideal For:

  • Students in the top half of their class who show an interest and aptitude in mathematics.
  • Parents seeking advanced math education for their children.
  • Learners who enjoy tackling complex and engaging math problems.

Enroll your student today to help them excel and develop a deeper appreciation for mathematics with the Dimensions Singapore Math curriculum!

item.title: Python for Tweens | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Embark on an exciting journey into the world of programming with Python! This class is designed to make coding fun, engaging, and accessible for kids as they explore the basics of Python through creative and interactive projects. Students will dive into programming concepts while solving puzzles, building games, and experimenting with whimsical projects featuring monsters, secret agents, and more!

Throughout the class, students will:

  • Learn foundational programming concepts like loops and conditionals.
  • Create colorful graphics and patterns using Python’s turtle module.
  • Build animations and interactive programs with the tkinter library.
  • Program their very own games, including a Pong clone and a platform game called "Mr. Stick Man Races for the Exit."

Each session is packed with hands-on coding, problem-solving challenges, and opportunities for creativity. By the end of the course, students will not only have created their own games and projects but will also have the confidence to continue exploring the limitless possibilities of programming!
